alert.note: Alert for Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:46AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Loma Alta, or 13 miles south of Tilden, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
